last_episode_to_air.name: Moving Out
last_episode_to_air.overview: As their apartment's demolition date draws near, Kaoru searches for a new place, and they all do their best to toss out the things they don't need.

name: Rilakkuma and Kaoru
original_name: リラックマとカオルさん
overview: Kaoru's unexpected new roommate is Rilakkuma, a bear with a zipper on its back that spends each day just lazing around -- but is impossible to hate.

episodes.name: Cherry Blossom
episodes.overview: Kaoru is dejected when her friends' busy lives prevent them from attending their annual Hanami. Rilakkuma can’t make pancakes without burning them.

episodes.name: Kidnapped
episodes.overview: A sense of panic takes over Kaoru when she receives a ransom note demanding a stack of pancakes in exchange for the safe return of Rilakkuma.

episodes.name: Rainy Season
episodes.overview: Heavy rains bring an unlikely growth of mushrooms inside the home, and Kaoru's spirits are dampened when she's the subject of office gossip.

episodes.name: Fireworks
episodes.overview: While Rilakkuma is able to wholeheartedly enjoy the food and games at the summer festival, Kaoru grows frustrated by her own perpetual indecisiveness.

episodes.name: Ghost Girl
episodes.overview: During a sudden power outage, Kaoru and her friends are stopped dead in their tracks when a spirit from beyond the grave makes a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Fortune-Telling
episodes.overview: After a streak of bad luck in the last days of summer, Kaoru sees a psychic, who implies that her three roommates are the cause of her problems.

episodes.name: Slim Down
episodes.overview: To help her lose weight -- and to catch a glimpse of the cute deliveryman -- Kaoru keeps ordering more and more costly exercise equipment online.

episodes.name: Getting a Job
episodes.overview: Seeing Kaoru struggle with her finances, Rilakkuma, Korilakkuma and Kiiroitori take it upon themselves to find part-time jobs -- with mixed results.

episodes.name: Snowman
episodes.overview: With a blanket of December snow covering the entire neighborhood, Rilakkuma offers his knit cap to a poor snowman who looks so cold.

episodes.name: Hawaii
episodes.overview: The roommates bring the sounds of aloha into their home to brighten Kaoru's day when a colleague's engagement in Hawaii brings her down.

episodes.name: Sleepless Night
episodes.overview: Thinking a streak of light in the night sky was a UFO, Korilakkuma tries to call it back by building a pyramid-shaped beacon out of junk.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.overview: In this flashback episode, Kaoru reminisces about the time she wanted a pet cat, but met the delightful bears who would become her roommates instead.

episodes.name: Moving Out
episodes.overview: As their apartment's demolition date draws near, Kaoru searches for a new place, and they all do their best to toss out the things they don't need.
